Description: Log Message not used in workflow FirstTask.
Recommendation: Using Log Message activities is important both during development and after release. They help understanding the flow path which is very useful for maintenance and, when an error occurs, to easily identify the source and the cause. [Learn more.](https://docs.uipath.com/studio/lang-en/v2021.4/docs/st-usg-020)

Description: Flowchart Flowchart is used in a secondary layer in FirstTask.
Recommendation: Flowchart should only be used in top layer for maintainability and readability reasons. [Learn more.](https://docs.uipath.com/studio/lang-en/v2021.4/docs/st-dbp-007)

Description: Variable ConnectingString has the same name as an existing argument.
Recommendation: Define unique names for variables and arguments. [Learn more.](https://docs.uipath.com/studio/lang-en/v2021.4/docs/st-nmg-006)

Description: Send Control Key display name is defined many times. Current allowed threshold is 1. Code contains 2.
Recommendation: Names of activities should give a clear indication of how they are being used. Default names are usually too generic. Please avoid duplicate names. [Learn more.](https://docs.uipath.com/studio/lang-en/v2021.4/docs/st-nmg-004)

Description: Argument ConnectingString does not respect the set pattern ^out_(dt_)?([A-Z]|[a-z])+([0-9])*$
Recommendation: Make sure all the arguments follow the naming convention. [Learn more.](https://docs.uipath.com/studio/lang-en/v2021.4/docs/st-nmg-002)

Description: Code starting at Save Email is unreachable.
Recommendation: Workflows should only have the necessary activities for its execution, and activities that are commented out or that are not connected to any node in a flowchart should be removed. If there is need to keep commented activities, add annotations to describe the reason. Consider removing unreachable activities. [Learn more.](https://docs.uipath.com/studio/lang-en/v2021.4/docs/st-mrd-004)

Description: The sequence Ignored Activities is redundant.
Recommendation: Redundant sequences should not be used, since they only make the workflow cluttered. For removing redundant sequences, use the Remove Surrounding Sequence option of the Context Menu in UiPath Studio. [Learn more.](https://docs.uipath.com/studio/lang-en/v2021.4/docs/st-mrd-005)
